dimensional.name: total gross floor area
dimensional.description: Accessory structures over 120 sf count toward this

usage.name: use
usage.description: Must be incidental to main dwelling

standards.name: accessory-structure height and daylight plane regulations

mandatory: Must have a use that is incidental to main dwelling
Must be detached and at least 3' from main dwelling
Count toward the total lot coverage

requirements: Count towards total gross floor area
May have no more than two plumbing fixtures

explicit_deviations.deviation: Do not require a building permit but must still comply with all zoning regulations

hierarchical.parent: Accessory structures located in the buildable area
child: Are subject to the same height and daylight plane regulations as the main dwelling

hierarchical.parent: Accessory structures located in the required setback
child: May not be located in the front yard
May not be located in the street-side yard
May not be located in the rear yard of a through lot
May not cover more than 50% of the rear yard
May not be used for sleeping or living
Are subject to the accessory-structure height and daylight plane regulations
Count toward the total lot coverage
If over 120 sf, require a building permit and count towards total gross floor area
If over 200 sf, may have no more than two plumbing fixtures
